tool_description:
Article Extraction API extracts clean html and text from news and blog articles.
Our API will process your request in the modern headless Chrome browser with proxy IP rotation and Javascript rendering!
name: Article HTML Extraction
title: Article HTML Extraction

api_list.name: Extract Article
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-html-extraction1.p.rapidapi.com/article_extract"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-html-extraction1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
